about_the_game:
Half Life of a Dog is a turn based game that combines map adventure, storyline, and life like elements.
The story takes place in Dog Star. As a dog, it's difficult to choose what kind of dog life to have. In the life of going with the flow, every day and everything seems to be arranged by an invisible hand. It can only move forward steadily with the passage of time. And you need to constantly strive and fight against them in order to earn meager dog coins.
As a dog, you will encounter different types of creatures in life. Stubborn donkeys, cunning foxes, birds that stand out, etc., they lurk around you through disguise. Are they also dogs? Of course, that hand also gave you some superficial benefits, allowing you to make simple dog life choices and give you some sweetness. Finally, complete the intangible hand arranged task - the three piece set of cattle and horses.
Looking for a dog? Having a dog? Buying a dog house? Everything needs to be faced alone, because dogs are always lonely.
Join the dog club? Perhaps you have already joined, but you haven't discovered it yet.
From the moment you step onto the path of dog life, perhaps until the finish line, you realize that you should live a good dog life this way.

short_description: Dog Star, as a dog, struggles with different colleagues in a simple life. Experience happy events and pitfalls, growth, marriage, buying a house, being fired, etc. This is a single player adventure, turn based game that allows players to see life clearly.
